Pantheios - Project Map - include

Contains all the header files defining the Pantheios Core, Application Layer, stock Back-end, stock Front-end and Utility components.

The header files are divided into the following sub-directories:

Sub-directory Purpose
b64 Header file(s) for the b64 library, which is bundled with Pantheios
pantheios Header files for all Pantheios components
pantheios/util Header files for the Pantheios Utility components
pantheios/backends Header files for all Pantheios stock Back-end components
pantheios/frontends Header files for all Pantheios stock Front-end components
pantheios/implicit_link Header files for implicit linking to Pantheios libraries
pantheios/inserters Header files for Pantheios Application Layer inserter classes
pantheios/internal Header files for internal (implementation) components
pantheios/quality Header files for quality assurance components / sub-systems
pantheios/test Header files for test-related components
shwild Header file(s) for the shwild library, which is bundled with Pantheios
xtests Header file(s) for the xTests library, which is bundled with Pantheios
